actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution directing the Committee on the Judiciary to investigate an incident involving the resignation of a certain clerk of the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Kentucky.

summary.text: Directs the Committee on the Judiciary to investigate an incident involving the resignation of a clerk of the United States District Court for the Western District of Kentucky.

titles.title: Resolution directing the Committee on the Judiciary to investigate an incident involving the resignation of a certain clerk of the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Kentucky.
